name: Stalker_Defense.Ninjitsu
display_help: Ninjitsu is the secret art of Ninja. Many Ninjitsu powers emphasize acute senses that allow you to react deftly to avoid danger. Others focus on the ability to hide in plain sight. Still others rely on the ancient art of Kuji Kiri, and the pure focus of the mind to accomplish the impossible.

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ninjitsu.Hide
powers.display_help: Hide makes you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassin's Strike' with an Assassin's power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. No Endurance cost. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 1.88% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 0.75s on self
3.75% strength to ranged, melee, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 0.75s on self
37.50% strength to AoE for 0.75s on self
1.88% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 0.75s on self
3.75% strength to ranged, melee, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 0.75s on self
37.50% strength to AoE for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ninjitsu.Ninja_Reflexes
powers.display_help: Activating your Ninja Reflexes enables you to be more evasive to melee attacks. This will increase your Defense versus melee as long as it is active. Ninja Reflexes also grants you resistance to Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast

display_info: 13.88% strength to melee for 0.75s on self
17.30% resistance to defense debuff for 0.75s on self
13.88% strength to melee for 0.75s on self
10.00% strength to melee for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ninjitsu.Danger_Sense
powers.display_help: You become more evasive against ranged and area attacks while you have Danger Sense activated. This will increase your Defense versus ranged and Area of Effect attacks as long as it is active. Your Danger Sense also allow you to perceive stealthy foes and resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast

display_info: 13.88% strength to ranged, AoE for 0.75s on self
13.88% strength to ranged, AoE for 0.75s on self
10.00% strength to ranged, AoE for 0.75s on self
60.00% resistance to perception radius debuff for 0.75s on self
17.30% resistance to defense debuff for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ninjitsu.Caltrops
powers.display_help: You toss a handful of Caltrops at a targeted location and spread the tiny metal spikes over a large area. Any enemy that passes over the Caltrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ninjitsu.Kuji-In_Rin
powers.display_help: Kuji-In Rin is the strength of mind and body. By focusing your power on this exercise, you gain a resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilization, Confusion, and fear, as well as resistance to Psionic damage for a few minutes. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Self +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Psionics)

display_info: -10.4 confuse protection, terrorize protection, hold protection, immobilize protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 2m 0s on self
103.80% resistance to confuse, terrorize, hold, immobilize, stun, sleep for 2m 0s on self
30.00% resistance to defense debuff, to hit debuff, recharge debuff for 2m 0s on self
50.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff for 2m 0s on self
22.50% resistance to psionic damage for 2m 0s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ninjitsu.Kuji-In_Sha
powers.display_help: Kuji-In Sha invokes the power of Sha, or healing. Focusing your inner power, you can heal your body of its wounds and leave yourself resistant to the effects of Toxic damage for a while. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 15.00% resistance to toxic damage for 1m 0s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ninjitsu.Smoke_Flash
powers.display_help: You throw a smoke bomb at your feet. The resulting flash of light and smoke can briefly distract your foes and Placate them so they can no longer find or target you. Combined with Hide, Smoke Flash is the perfect distraction to get out of a bad situation. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ninjitsu.Blinding_Powder
powers.display_help: You throw a handful of Blinding powder in a wide arc at your foes. Most foes will be blinded, and unable to see. Some affected targets may be overcome by the powder that they may start attacking their own allies. If you attack the blinded foes, they will be alerted to your presence, but will continue to suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 25 ft. radius 45° arc (10 targets max)
display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 2.0 sleep for 11.92s on target after 0.25s delay
2.0 sleep for 2s on target after 0.25s delay
50.00% chance for 2.0 confuse for 23.84s on target
50.00% chance for 2.0 confuse for 2s on target

powers.name: Stalker_Defense.Ninjitsu.Kuji-In_Retsu
powers.display_help: Kuji-In Retsu is the mastery of space and time. Focusing your power on Retsu enables you to control your own time to easily defeat your foes. Mastery of this power enables you to avoid almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed, jumping height and Endurance Recovery are also increased. Retsu also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs. When Retsu wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Extremely Long

display_info: 45.00% strength to ranged, melee, AoE for 3m 0s on self
34.60% resistance to defense debuff for 3m 0s on self
-10000.00% recovery rate for 20s on self after 3m 0s delay
